name: Xenith Defenders
description:
Xenith Defenders

Xentih Defenders is an Atari inspired multiplayer game where two players compete to be the last one standing using their sluggish tanks on 5 unique battlefields!

Be the first to win 5 rounds to win the match!

Features
  • Keyboard and Gamepad Input
  • Unique 1-bit color style
  • Intense methodical combat
  • Building destruction
  • 5 diverse and tactically crafted stages
  • Heavy retro four-on-the-floor beats
  • Infinite replayabillity
Controls
  • Turning
    • P1  > WASD / DPAD / ANALOG
    • P2  > ARROW KEYS / DPAD / ANALOG
  • Acceleration
    • Player 1
      • W / RIGHT TRIGGER
      • [XBOX A, PS4 X, NINTENDO B]
    • Player 2
      • UP ARROW / RIGHT TRIGGER
      • [XBOX A, PS4 X, NINTENDO B]
  • Reverse
    • Player 1
      • S / LEFT TRIGGER
      • [XBOX B, PS4 CIRCLE, NINTENDO A]
    • Player 2
      • DOWN ARROW / LEFT TRIGGER
      • [XBOX B, PS4 CIRCLE, NINTENDO A]
  • Fire
    • Player 1
      • F
      • [XBOX X, PS4 SQUARE, NINTENDO Y]
    • Player 2
      • NUMPAD 0, CTRL
      • [XBOX X, PS4 SQUARE, NINTENDO Y]
  • Quit
    • ESC
    • [SELECT + START]
Credits

Chaz Acheronti - GODOT Programmer, Music and Sound Production, Game Designer

Justin Kim - 2D Artist, Game Designer
